Articles.Content:
Hello! You may know me as DeltaVerb. I made this new account as I made a new e-mail address, made a new account on my PC... I also wanted to have a fresh start, as there were loads of things I did, but now don't like. Hope to still be me. 

As always, be good and goodbye.
As each forum member may only have one account (4.2), your old one has been merged into this one.
Umm... thanks! Just wondering if you could get rid of my posts? Somehow? If not, it doesn't matter.
Sorry, we do not delete posts which are not rule-breaking, and you have too many to hide.
